suncertify.remote
Class RemoteFacadePoolImpl

java.lang.Object
  java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
          java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
              suncertify.remote.RemoteFacadePoolImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.rmi.Remote, RemoteDataFacadePool, java.io.Serializable
public class RemoteFacadePoolImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements RemoteDataFacadePool

Implementation of the pool of RemoteDataFacade instances which returns a remote instance of a RemoteDataFacade when needed, using a round robin algorithm. A maximum of 20 clients is allowed.

A method to release and give back a RemoteFacade instance to the pool is available.

The name which are given by the pool are in the form DATAFACADEXX where XX is a number from 0 to 20

A client should always be associated with just one RemoteFacade instance, and that is enforced by the methods registerDataFacade and releaseDataFacade

See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

registerDataFacade

public java.lang.String registerDataFacade()
                                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Register an instance of RemoteDataFacade with the RMI server and returns the name which can be used to reference it. The name is saved in the internal list as a string
